title: Summer Wolf
description: "Summer Reign a teen living in Chicago, Illinois leads a lonely existance. Her father disappears and her mother spends her time at the bars with different men. One phone call changes her entire life. She is swept away to the mountains of Cherokee, North Carolina. She learns her life had been a lie. She also learns that werewolves, banshees and chimeras really do exist.When she decides to run from her demons danger beyond belief. Would she be raped by a pack of wolves or be killed? Befriended by a wolf named Eagle who is more intelligent than your run of the mill wolf she finds herself drawn to him. Her journey takes her to Waterford Castle in Ireland where she seeks revenge. Would she embrace her inner self or would her demons destroy her?"http://www.amazon.com/dp/B008L2KNDI/r...
author: Leesia Champion
